oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Inside Nashville - Biff Collie - 1975
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpt from an Inside Nashville radio segment, featuring Biff Collie (host), in 1975 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Biff Collie talks about Dolly Parton and Leon Wilson and introduces Inside Nashville -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Biff Collie) -- Biff Collie talks about Don Williams and his past musical endeavors -- Collie talks about Larry Gatlin and his background -- Collie talks about Bobby Bare Jr. -- Inside Nashville jingle -- Biff Collie talks about Tex Ritter meeting with Richard Nixon -- Collie talks about Tex Ritter's death -- Inside Nashville jingle -- Collie talks about Charlie Pride's health and canceling shows to attend the Brewers spring training -- Collie talks about Johnny Cash age and Donna Fargo (incomplete) -- Inside Nashville jingle -- Collie talks about Bill Anderson's endorsements from department stores -- Collie talks about George Jones' new cars -- Collie talks about Buck Owens new show along with the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band (incomplete) -- Inside Nashville jingle -- Collie talks about Chet Atkins tribute to Tex Ritter's death -- Collie talks about Eddy Arnold reminiscing on Tex Ritter's life -- Collie talks about Ernest Tubb and Tex Ritter -- Collie talks about Gene Autry's remarks on Tex Ritter -- Inside Nashville jingle
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Collie, Biff;
